DOC.criteria: 1 . Is healthy adult male nonpregnant , nonlactating female . 2 . Is age 18 55 year , inclusive . 3 . Weighs least 55 kg ( 121 lb ) body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 30.0 kg/m^2 , inclusive . 4 . Has systolic blood pressure > 90 ≤150 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure > 60 ≤90 mm Hg Screening Checkin ( Day 2 ) . 5 . Has calculate creatinine clearance > 60 mL/min Screening Checkin ( Day 2 ) . 1 .
